title: Welding 101
description:
2 Pdf files of Welding using a Haynes TechBook series with 350 photos, Choosing welding equip, Oxy-Acetal welding, heating and cutting metal, Arc, MIG,TIG,Plasma-arc & trailer building project

and a Technical Welding course textbook. Pretty informative overall for those who know little about welding and how to do it...including underwater welding

Here is a table of contents from the books:
